sentences.en: During the turmoil in the foreign-exchange markets the guilder remained strong.
sentences.cn: 荷兰盾在外汇交易市场的动荡中保持坚挺。

sentences.en: Four of my cassettes for your Madonna CD is a fair exchange.
sentences.cn: 我用四盒磁带换你的麦当娜激光唱片很公平。

sentences.en: I'm going to go on an exchange visit to Paris.
sentences.cn: 我将到巴黎交流参观。

sentences.en: It was one of the City's prime sites, near the Stock Exchange.
sentences.cn: 这是伦敦最好的地段之一，离证券交易所很近。

sentences.en: it would cancel its disciplinary hearing in exchange for Harding's dropping her lawsuit.
sentences.cn: 作为哈定撤诉的交换条件，它将取消其惩戒性的听证会。

sentences.en: It’s a place where people can chat and exchange ideas.
sentences.cn: 在这个地方人们可以聊天和交流想法。

sentences.en: On the Stock Exchange, aggressive buying propped the market up.
sentences.cn: 在证券交易所，市场在大量买单的推动下有所上扬。

sentences.en: Peter and I also did a cabaret at the Corn Exchange.
sentences.cn: 我和彼得也在CornExchange剧院上演了喜剧表演。

sentences.en: Share prices on the Tokyo Exchange declined moderately.
sentences.cn: 东京股票交易所的股价小幅下跌。

sentences.en: Shares ended 1.7 per cent firmer on the Frankfurt exchange.
sentences.cn: 法兰克福交易所收盘时股票上涨了1.7%。

sentences.en: That's settled then. We'll exchange addresses tonight.
sentences.cn: 那就定下来了，我们今晚交换联系地址。

sentences.en: There was an exchange of fire during which the gunman was wounded.
sentences.cn: 有过交火，其间那名持枪歹徒受伤了。

sentences.en: They exchange traveller's cheques at a different rate from notes.
sentences.cn: 他们兑换旅行支票时依据的汇率跟兑换现钞时不同。

sentences.en: This could intensify the risk of a nuclear exchange.
sentences.cn: 这可能会加剧爆发核战争的危险。

sentences.en: This deferral would obviate pressure on the rouble exchange rate.
sentences.cn: 这一延期将消除卢布汇率面临的压力。

sentences.en: To earn foreign exchange we must export.
sentences.cn: 要想获得外汇，我们必须出口。

sentences.en: Trading on the stock exchange may be suspended.
sentences.cn: 证券交易可能被暂停。

sentences.en: We exchange gifts at Christmas.
sentences.cn: 我们在圣诞节时交换礼物。

sentences.en: We exchanged addresses.
sentences.cn: 我们交换了地址。

sentences.en: We've got a fairly unfavourable exchange rate at the moment.
sentences.cn: 眼下汇率对我们不利。
